long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
TMC FB Invite Page. 

Automatically invite post likers to increase follow facebook fanpage organic and grow quickly.
You can use it with one click on extention chrome.
This is the best extension for you.

Features included are the following:
★ Works with one click on extention chrome
★ Increase follow facebook fanpage organic and grow quickly
★ Shows the number of people who have not yet been invited to follow the page.
★ Automatically scroll load the list of likers
★ Random time delay for each invite, Show countdown timer
★ User can custom time delay for each invite
★ Protect account for work on process

How to use.
1. Open facebook.com on chrome
2. Open post liker to you like
3. Click on the extension (TMC FB Invite Page)
4. Click Start Inviting button
